title: Bug 6304: Unable to sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu. The 'Team' entry should be present in the context menu to allow for synchronization.
OB: The 'Team' entry is missing from the context menu when attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource.
EB: Upon opening the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not present.
SR: Ensure that the 'Team' entry is displayed in the context menu when trying to sync a .java file with another resource.
